title: Devil on Wheels cinema slide
brief_description: Glass cinema lantern slide with black edging tape. A large piece of cream tape has been adhered to the bottom of the slide to cover some cinema session times. This hand coloured slide is an advertisement for the film ‘Devils on Wheels’ featuring Ann Sheridan, Pat O’ Brien and John Payne by Warner Bros.
